title: raamaa dhaivashikhaamaNi
sahitya:
rAma daivashikhAmaNi sura rAjamahOjjvala bhUmaNi 

tAmarasAkSa sudhImaNi bhavya tAraka bhakta cintAmaNi



caraNam 1



 nADE mimu vEDukoNtigA sharaNAgata birudani viNtigA 

vEDukai mimu pogaDa naNTigA nannu digaviDanADa vaddaNDigA



caraNam 2



 citta sEyaka nEmi lEdugA mundu jEsina gati tappa bOdugA 

intaku mikkili rAdugA nE nitarula golicEdi lEdugA



caraNam 3



 tammuDu nIvokka jaNTanu rAmadAsuni rakSinca kuNTanu 

sammati nuncu mAyiNTanu bhadrAcalavAsa nI baNTu baNTanu
